sense.def:
To pinch someone
pomeni stisniti del človekovega telesa med palcem in kazalcem.

seg.quote: Dr. Hochstadt pinched Judy's cheek as she passed.
She gave my wrist a little pinch.

sense.def:
A pinch of something
je tako majhna količina, da jo lahko držimo med palcem in kazalcem.

seg.quote: Season with salt and a pinch of cinnamon.

sense.def:
To pinch something
pomeni nekaj ukrasti;

seg.quote: I pinched fourpence from the box.

sense.def:
At a pinch
pomeni če je res nujno potrebno in ni druge možnosti;

seg.quote: At a pinch the new doctor would do.

sense.def:
To feel the pinch
pomeni, da nimamo več toliko denarja kot včasih in ne moremo kupiti vsega, kar bi radi imeli.

cit.quote: biti na tesnem z denarjem, biti v denarnih težavah

seg.quote: The big fashion establishments have been feeling the pinch lately.
